body: I will work on this. Any chance I can chat with someone on Slack on how to proceed. This would be my first PR here.
Yup! Join our slack and we can help out with any questions you have.
Will do. Ill hop on tomorrow at work. Thanks.

repository.name: babel

body: Just letting anyone looking at this that I won't be working on this issue. I am instead going to take some time go get acclimated to the Babel codebase before focusing on any specific issue.  Feel free to take a whack at it.
@loganfsmyth I can work on this issue. Thanks
@UtkarshGupta-CS Are you able to fix the issue? I would like to work on it.This would be my first PR.

FYI TypeScript caches in modules for simplicity (it solves 99% of the use-cases this way), and we're planning on using the helper function as the cache map in the future. Feel free to loop me in on issues relating to this.

@DanielRosenwasser I'm not 100% sure you followed what I'm saying with this issue, so to clarify, the spec is changing to drop the global caching entirely in favor of per-call-site caching. Given that, I'm not sure I follow what you mean about using the helper function as a map.
True, thanks for pointing that out :)
I see multiple people commented that they're picking this up. Can someone confirm that they're working on it still?
